title: 65 PSA graded OJs available for trade
author: cozmokramer

posts.post_title: 65 PSA graded OJs available for trade
posts.post_content:
I have about 65 PSA graded old judges available for trade.  I have a couple hall of famers such as King Kelly, Pud Galvin, Dan Brothers and Clark Griffith.

Looking to trade for a PSA graded 1951 bowman Mickey Mantle and/or Willie Mays.

Please PM me if you have one or both of them and would like to discuss a trade.
